name: Talking Turtle: All Stars! Version: 1.5.0.
description:
Talking Turtle: All Stars! A New original game with a dark twist? Who is it? What is it? Why doesn't it die? Can it die? Who's next? Can I just have fun and play as Taco Turtle V.s. my friend playing as plush and finally find out who will win in multiplayer? All of these questions shall be answered in Talking Turtle: All Stars

Version: 1.5.0.

Version 1.5.0. Update notes:
-Fixed music bug -Fixed repeating music bug
-Fixed enemy flying off screen bug
-Fixed boss having 0 Hp at beginning of game bug
-Added more music to the game
-Added a new Enemy
